panel.title: AWS CloudTrail - Notable Activity by User in Past 24 Hours

table.searchString: sourcetype="aws:cloudtrail" NOT (eventName=Describe* OR eventName=List* OR eventName=Get*) | stats count by awsRegion userName eventName | stats sum(count) as count by userName | eventstats sum(count) as sum | sort - count | eval percent=tostring(round(100*count/sum, 0))+"%" | fields - sum |rename userName as "User Name", count as Count, percent as Percent
